## ICO KUTIBAGIRA
Tegura igikorwa cawe, ntufate amajwi vyose…capa ngene uza gukora kugira bize kugufasha mugihe uzoba uriko uravugana nabo bantu canke uriko uramufata amajwi.hamagara abozoguha ikiganiro hakiri kare ubabaze aho mwohurira na ryari mwobonana…Banza mwiyumvire abo mushaka kubwira inkuru yanyu imbere yukuvuga uti ngira nkore iyi nkuru canke ngira mfate amajwi ameze gutya.
